# Terraform variables
This document gives an overview of the variables used in the different platforms of the Tectonic SDK.

## Inputs

| Name | Description | Type | Default |
|------|-------------|:----:|:-----:|
| tectonic_ssh_authorized_key | SSH public key to use as an authorized key. Example: `"ssh-rsa AAAB3N..."` | string | - |
| tectonic_vmware_cluster | vCenter Cluster used to create VMs under | string | - |
| tectonic_vmware_controller_domain | The domain name which resolves to controller node(s) | string | - |
| tectonic_vmware_datacenter | Virtual DataCenter to deploy VMs into | string | - |
| tectonic_vmware_datastore | Datastore to deploy the Cluster into | string | - |
| tectonic_vmware_etcd_gateway | gateway IP address for etcd Virtual Machine | string | - |
| tectonic_vmware_etcd_hostnames | terraform map of Virtual Machine Hostnames | map | - |
| tectonic_vmware_etcd_ip | terraform map of Virtual Machine IPs | map | - |
| tectonic_vmware_etcd_memory | etcd node Memory Size in MB | string | `4096` |
| tectonic_vmware_etcd_vcpu | etcd node vCPU count | string | `1` |
| tectonic_vmware_folder | vSphere Folder to create and add the Tectonic objects to | string | - |
| tectonic_vmware_ingress_domain | The domain name which resolves to Tectonic Ingress (i.e. worker node(s)) | string | - |
| tectonic_vmware_master_gateway | gateway IP address for master Virtual Machine | string | - |
| tectonic_vmware_master_hostnames | terraform map of Virtual Machine Hostnames | map | - |
| tectonic_vmware_master_ip | terraform map of Virtual Machine IPs | map | - |
| tectonic_vmware_master_memory | master node Memory Size in MB | string | `4096` |
| tectonic_vmware_master_vcpu | master node vCPU count | string | `1` |
| tectonic_vmware_network | Portgroup to attach the cluster nodes into | string | - |
| tectonic_vmware_node_dns | DNS Server in use by nodes | string | - |
| tectonic_vmware_password | Password to Use | string | - |
| tectonic_vmware_server | vCenter Server IP/FQDN | string | - |
| tectonic_vmware_sslselfsigned | Is the vCenter certificate Self-Signed? | string | - |
| tectonic_vmware_username | Username to Use to connect to vCenter | string | `Administrator@vsphere.local` |
| tectonic_vmware_vm_template | Virtual Machine template of CoreOS Container Linux. | string | - |
| tectonic_vmware_vm_template_folder | Folder for VM template of CoreOS Container Linux. | string | - |
| tectonic_vmware_worker_gateway | gateway IP address for worker Virtual Machine | string | - |
| tectonic_vmware_worker_hostnames | terraform map of Virtual Machine Hostnames | map | - |
| tectonic_vmware_worker_ip | terraform map of Virtual Machine IPs | map | - |
| tectonic_vmware_worker_memory | worker node Memory Size in MB | string | `4096` |
| tectonic_vmware_worker_vcpu | worker node vCPU count | string | `1` |
